INITIATE_CARGO_SCAN_2.message: Coinnigh an luas agus an cúrsa céanna chun scanadh lasta a dhéanamh.

NOTHING_DETECTED.message: Níor bhraitheamar aon lasta mídhleathach. Lean ort.

OUTLAW_DETECTED_1.message: Coirpeach cruthaithe a eitlíonn {ship_label}. Déan ionradh air agus scrios é!

OUTLAW_DETECTED_2.message: Is gearr eile a mhairfidh tú, a mheirligh!

OUTLAW_DETECTED_3.message: Há, tá tú gafa! Ní éalóidh tú ón réaltchóras seo!

POLICE_TAUNT_2.message: Smuggler, you will pay the ultimate price!

POLICE_TAUNT_3.message: Ní bhaintear tairbhe as coiriúlacht a amadáin!

RESPECT_THE_LAW_1.message: Géill don dlí! Ní bhaintear tairbhe as coiriúlacht i réaltchóras {system}!

RESPECT_THE_LAW_2.message: Tá tú i réaltchóras {system} anois. Géill don dlí!

RESTRICTIONS_ESTABLISHED_1.message: The threat has been eliminated. {ship_label}, weapons fire restrictions are now in effect.

RESTRICTIONS_WITHDRAWN_1.message: {ship_label}, you are authorized to open fire.

TAKE_A_HIKE.message: Ok, tá seans eile agat. Gread leat!
